016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
017
018import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao.UserDao;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
021import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
022import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
023import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.DisposableContainer;
024import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Action;
025import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
026import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
027import java.time.Instant;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Objects;
030import javax.inject.Inject;
031import javax.inject.Singleton;
032
033/**
034 * Provides high-level operations on a repository of {@link User} instances, backed by a SQLite
035 * database, in turn accessed via {@link TeamleDatabase}. This class has no mutable state, and its
036 * methods are thread-safe; however, mutating operations (involving {@code INSERT}, {@code UPDATE},
037 * or {@code DELETE} on the underlying database) attempted simultaneously could block or fail.
038 */
039@SuppressWarnings("unused")
040@Singleton
041public class UserRepository {
042
043  private final UserDao userDao;
044  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
045
046  /**
047   * Initializes this instance by establishing a logical connection to the underlying database.
048   */
049
050  @Inject
051  UserRepository(UserDao userDao, GoogleSignInService signInService) {
052    this.userDao = userDao;
053    this.signInService = signInService;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), retrieves the
058   * {@link User} instance for the current signed-in user from the database, and passes it to the
059   * subscribing {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer}.
060   */
061  public Single<User> getCurrent() {
062    return getOrCreate().subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Returns a {@link LiveData}-based query for the {@link User} entity instance identified by
067   * {@code id}. The query executes when observed, or (if already being observed) whenever the
068   * contents of the underlying {@code user} table are modified using Room data-access methods.
069   *
070   * @param id Unique identifier (primary key value) of a {@link User} entity instance.
071   * @return {@link LiveData}-based query for the {@link User} identified by {@code id}.
072   */
073  public LiveData<User> get(long id) {
074    return userDao.select(id);
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of all {@link User} entity instances. The query executes
079   * when observed, or (if already being observed) whenever the contents of the underlying
080   * {@code user} table are modified using Room data-access methods.
081   */
082  public LiveData<List<User>> getAll() {
083    return userDao.select();
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} task that, when executed (subscribed to), will insert
088   * or update the specified {@code user} in the database, and pass the updated {@link User}
089   * instance to the subscribing {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer}. The specific
090   * persistence operation is determined by examining the value returned by {@link User#getId()}: a
091   * value of zero (0) indicates the {@code user} has not yet been {@code INSERT}ed and must be; a
092   * non-zero value indicates that {@code user} is already in the database, and must thus be
093   * {@code UPDATE}d.
094   *
095   * @param user Instance of {@link User} entity class to be persisted (inserted or updated) in the
096   *             database.
097   * @return {@link Single} task that will persist {@code user} to the database when executed
098   * (subscribed to).
099   */
100  public Single<User> save(User user) {
101    return (
102        (user.getId() == 0)
103            ? insert(user)
104            : update(user)
105    )
106        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Constructs and returns a {@link Completable} task that, when executed (subscribed to), will
111   * remove the specified {@code user} from the database, if present, and invoke the subscribing
112   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Action} on completion. Whether the deletion is even
113   * necessary is determined by examining the value returned by {@link User#getId()}: a value of
114   * zero (0) indicates the {@code user} has not been inserted into the database, and thus need not
115   * be deleted; a non-zero value indicates that {@code user} is in the database and must be
116   * {@code DELETE}d.
117   * <p>If an attempt is made to delete the {@link User} entity instance corresponding to the
118   * current signed-in user, the {@link Completable} will fail, with an
119   * {@link IllegalStateException} passed to the
120   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer Consumer&lt;Throwable&gt;} specified in
121   * {@link Completable#subscribe(Action, Consumer, DisposableContainer)}.</p>
122   *
123   * @param user Instance of {@link User} entity class to be deleted from the database.
124   * @return {@link Completable} task that will delete {@code user} from the database when executed
125   * (subscribed to).
126   */
127  public Completable delete(User user) {
128    return (
129        (user.getId() == 0)
130            ? Completable.complete()
131            : checkSafeDelete(user)
132                .flatMap(userDao::delete)
133                .ignoreElement()
134    )
135        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
136  }
137
138  private Single<User> getOrCreate() {
139    return signInService
140        .refresh()
141        .flatMap((account) -> userDao.select(account.getId())
142            .switchIfEmpty(
143                Single
144                    .fromSupplier(() -> {
145                      User user = new User();
146                      user.setOauthKey(Objects.requireNonNull(account.getId()));
147                      user.setDisplayName(Objects.requireNonNull(account.getDisplayName()));
148                      return user;
149                    })
150                    .flatMap(this::insert)
151            )
152        );
153  }
154
155  private Single<User> insert(User user) {
156    user.setCreated(Instant.now());
157    return userDao
158        .insert(user)
159        .map((id) -> {
160          user.setId(id);
161          return user;
162        });
163  }
164
165  private Single<User> update(User user) {
166    return userDao
167        .update(user)
168        .map((count) -> user);
169  }
170
171  private Single<User> checkSafeDelete(User user) {
172    return getOrCreate()
173        .map((u) -> {
174          if (u.equals(user)) {
175            throw new IllegalStateException("");
176          }
177          return u;
178        });
179  }
180
181}
